[[inst_hl_sdi]]
==== HL.SDI

*Syntax:* hl.sdi SrcD, [SrcR, simm]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sdi.svg[HL.SDI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/LONG
